sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Le Sénat de la France a fait une réforme contravérée au système de pension du pays de 195 votes à 112, tard la soirée.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Cela signifie que le package du gouvernement pour élever l'âge de pension de 62 à 64 ans est un pas plus proche de la loi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Nous sommes parvenus au terme de ce débat très dense dans lequel chacun s'est exprimé.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: débat très dense dans lequel chacun s'est exprimé depuis le jeudi 2 mars nous avons siégé dix jours et quasiment autant de nuits en continu pour un total de plus de 100 heures de débat nous avons enregistré un nombre record d'amendements de sous-amendements 8900 au total The vote comes hours after hundreds of thousands of people marched in protest in rallies across the country, although in significantly fewer numbers than expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kyiv says fighting in the Ukrainian city of Bakhmut has further escalated with another push by Russian forces to break through its defensive lines that have largely held firm for the past six months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the fields and dugouts near the city, the Ukrainian fight back has been fraught with problems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Images released by a Russian news agency purportedly feature Wagner Group mercenary fighters from assault teams in the southern part of the city. Bakhmut has become the longest-running battle in Russia's year-long offensive and it's coming at a high price for both sides with some already calling it the Verdun of the 21st century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Around 1,300 migrants have been rescued from the Mediterranean off Italy's southern coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Italian Coast Guard signalled on Friday that a large rescue operation was underway

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: after three boats carrying the migrants were seen to be in danger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Rescue teams were dispatched to save migrants aboard three smugglers' boats off the Calabrian coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: migrants aboard three smugglers boats off the Calabrian coast. It comes the same day as a body was discovered of the 74th victim of the deadly shipwreck off the same coast nearly two weeks ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The victim was reported to have been a five or six year old girl.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Prosecutors are investigating whether Italian authorities failed to properly respond to the call after they deployed border enforcement vessels rather than rescue boats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Italy's Interior Ministry says more than 17,500 people have arrived by sea so far this year, almost three times the number for the same period last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The 21st edition of the International Film Festival and Forum on Human Rights returns to Geneva.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A must-see event for human rights activists fusing film, politics and current affairs.

sentences.sentence: Opera sensation and the festival's patron, Barbara Hendricks, treated fans to a stunning performance. On a la possibilité de voir les histoires qui nous disent que nous ne sommes pas seuls dans nos combats.
